message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am prepared to consider offers that reflect its true significance. Given its importance to both of us, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer allows you to secure this remarkable product while ensuring a fair return for my investment. I look forward to discussing this further and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.
